DOC.brief_summary: investigator intend study effect laser versus ultrasonic activation irrigation post operative pain patient symptomatic necrotic teeth
DOC.brief_title: Effect Diode Laser Activated Irrigation Versus Ultrasonic Post-Operative Pain Single Visit Necrotic Teeth
DOC.detailed_description: investigator choose patient enter clinic endodontics faculty oral dental medicine Cairo university eligible criterion . After patient find eligible , patient randomly assign either control ( ultrasonic activate irrigation ) intervention ( diode laser activate irrigation ) treatment do single visit . At end treatment , patient ask record post operative pain NRS .
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic necrotic single root single canal teeth without chronic periradicular lesion . Teeth mature root Teeth without calcified root canal Teeth without root caries Teeth without internal external root resorption Teeth sign crack formation Teeth without anatomic abnormality Pregnant lactate female Teeth vital pulp Non restorable teeth Medically compromise patient Patients facial swell acute infection . Previously endodontically treat teeth periodontally affect teeth
